body:
Comment 2: 
I agree - hg help should mention them - but it can't.
The Mercurial authors have decided (and written code to ensure)
that "hg help" only lists built-in commands.  The mention of the
codereview extension in the extensions section is supposed to
make you think about running "hg help codereview" to find out
the commands for that extension.
_Status changed to **WontFix**._
